descriptionarticle.text: Forcibly suppress or un-suppress all quantization and Huffman tables.

parameters.parameter: If set to true then suppress tables; otherwise unsuppress.

remarks.text: Marks all currently defined tables as already written (if suppress) or not written (if !suppress). This will control whether they get emitted by a subsequent
This routine is exported for use by applications that want to produce abbreviated JPEG datastreams.
